author: Simon Difford
description: A blue-rinsed Daiquiri with orange and pineapple - with tequila instead of rum it would be a Twisted Margarita.
name: Turquoise Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
